company.name: Austrian Institute for European and Security Policy (AIES)

profile_positions.company: Austrian Institute for European and Security Policy (AIES)
profile_positions.description:
I am doing research guided by Dr Michä'el Tanchum (PhD. Harvard), who is a fellow at the Hebrew University's Truman Research Institute for the Advancement of Peace, at the Austria Institut für Europa und Sicherheitspolitik (AIES), and an affiliated scholar with the Centre for Strategic Studies at Baskent University in Ankara. He is also a nonresident Senior Fellow at the Global Energy Center and the Eurasian Energy Futures Initiative at the Atlantic Council and a Professor of International Relations in the Middle East and the Maghreb at the University of Navarra.
The research focused on the economic and military presence & influence of the Russian Federation in the Maghreb and Northern Africa.
